questions.question: This arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates exploring a dangerous, beast-filled island and confronting a mad scientist. What is...?
This story arc is named after its geographical formation and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This Devil Fruit power allows its user to manipulate and create biscuits at will. What is...?
This character, the former captain of the Heart Pirates, is known for his ability to grant eternal youth with the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This character, a princess of the Fish-Man Island, has the ability to communicate with sea kings. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Roger Pirates and known for his light-light fruit powers, played a significant role in the Void Century. Who is...?
